title: Office of the Director | NIST
snippet: Craig Burkhardt was appointed to serve as the Deputy Under Secretary of Commerce for Standards and Technology and NIST Deputy Director in January 2025.

title: Salary: Nist (November, 2025) United States
snippet: The average NIST SALARY in the United States as of October 2025 is $47.79 an hour or $99,400 per year. Get paid what you're worth!

title: How Much Does NIST Pay in 2025? (48 Salaries) | Glassdoor
snippet: A free inside look at NIST salary trends based on 48 salaries wages for 35 jobs at NIST. Salaries posted anonymously by NIST employees.

title: New Chair, Vice Chair Elected to NIST Policy Advisory Group | NIST
snippet: The new chair is Vinton Cerf, vice president and chief Internet evangelist for Google, where he identifies new enabling technologies and applications on the Internet and other platforms.
